CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Ride Icefang around and shoot giants and dogs\n\nPress continue when done - don't go far, you have to save some peeps with a proto-drake

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Grab a Proto-drake, hit 3 ice tombs to get 3 riders, and fly out of there, the proto-drake will take you home. Do this 3 times\n\nPress continue when done

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Kill Kirgaraak - don't go far, you have to kill 6 bear riders right after\n\nGet off the bear and press continue - i'll turn in for ya

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Kill 6 bear riders

Get off the bear and press continue - i'll turn in for ya

Don't go far, you have another vehicle quest soon

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
The drake will fly you there, use harpoon to jump drakes once you're there
To get off, select an orb and use harpoon on it

Press continue and i'll do some quests while we're here

Don't go far, you have a Turret quest soon

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Shoot 6 stacks of hay\n\nPress continue when you're out

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Get a boulder on the ground and use "Thorim's Charm of Earth" on the giants and Fjorn. Help the dorfs kill them
Make sure you get "Slag Covered Metal" from a giant and pick the quest up - do that one, too. I recommend doing that one and killing giants when they agro - Turn it into Fjorn's Anvil, pickup "A Spark of Hope"

Press continue when done - I'll fly you to Thorim. Don't go too far, there's a few more vehicle quests

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Jump on Snorri and help him kill 10 Fires - jump off near Njormeld when finished and press continue

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Press continue and watch your bot until it summons a wolf vehicle. Slow / net the guys running after you

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: This is experimental. fly your toon up to a turret and press continue. if you get kicked out of turret, fly to another. aim turret as needed - the bot will fire\n\nI'll automate this soon

TurnIn.QuestName: Once More Unto the Breach, Hero

The Stone That Started A Revolution

TurnIn.QuestName: The Stone That Started A Revolution

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Use the item on the elites and kill them\n\nAfter this quest, the profile will grind you to 80 - i recommend AB until 80 and then switching to my Cata flying profiles
